key_modifications: Set FastAPI application title and description
Added session middleware with custom cookie name
Implemented health check and root endpoints

patterns_discovered: Using settings from a centralized configuration module
Adding middleware for CORS and session management
gotchas_discovered: Session cookie set to http_only=False, which could be a security risk
Max session age set to 30 minutes
No explicit error handling in endpoints
recommendations: Consider setting https_only=True for session middleware in production
Add more detailed logging in lifespan and endpoint methods
